Prompts.TranslatePrompt: Translate values of this array of json objects to {0}? NOTE: return as result the same array of json objects but translated, also content value in response should contain valid json, since it will be used directly in application.
Prompts.EditTextPrompt: You will receive USERPROMPT and EXISTINGTEXT. USERPROMPT is the user's instruction, and EXISTINGTEXT is the text to be modified. Your response should include the EXISTINGTEXT with any modifications specified in USERPROMPT. Ensure the response is pure text, as it will be used directly in the application.
